meta.description: Comprehensive gaming community with LFG, tournaments, rank systems, events, and detailed moderation

channels.name: 👋┃welcome
channels.topic: Server information, rules, and role selection

pin.title: 👋 Welcome Gamers!
pin.description: Welcome to our gaming community! We're excited to have you here. Please read the rules and get your roles to fully enjoy the server.

fields.name: 📜 Server Rules
fields.value:
• Be respectful to all members
• No spam, NSFW, or harassment
• Use appropriate channels for content
• Follow Discord's Terms of Service

fields.name: 🎮 Getting Started
fields.value:
• Read #rules for detailed guidelines
• Get your roles in #role-selection
• Introduce yourself in #introductions
• Check #announcements for updates

fields.name: 🎯 What We Offer
fields.value:
• LFG for various games
• Tournaments and events
• Ranked role system
• Community showcases
• Voice channels for gaming

channels.name: 📜┃rules
channels.topic: Detailed server rules and guidelines

pin.title: 📜 Server Rules & Guidelines
pin.description: Please read and follow these rules to maintain a positive gaming environment for everyone.

fields.name: 🤝 General Behavior
fields.value:
• **Be Respectful:** Treat all members with kindness and respect
• **No Harassment:** Bullying, trolling, or harassment will not be tolerated
• **No Spam:** Avoid excessive messages, emojis, or mentions
• **Stay On Topic:** Use channels for their intended purpose

fields.name: 🎮 Gaming Rules
fields.value:
• **Fair Play:** No cheating, exploiting, or unfair advantages
• **Sportsmanship:** Be a good winner and loser
• **Teamwork:** Work together and help new players
• **Respect Opponents:** Trash talk is fine, but keep it friendly

fields.name: 📝 Content Guidelines
fields.value:
• **No NSFW:** Keep content appropriate for all ages
• **No Self-Promotion:** Use #self-promotion for your content
• **Respect Copyright:** Don't share copyrighted material
• **Quality Content:** Share meaningful and relevant content

fields.name: 🔇 Voice Chat Rules
fields.value:
• **No Background Noise:** Use push-to-talk when possible
• **Respect Others:** Don't interrupt or talk over others
• **Appropriate Language:** Keep language clean and friendly
• **No Music Bots:** Use music channels for music

fields.name: ⚖️ Enforcement
fields.value:
• **Warnings:** First offense usually results in a warning
• **Timeouts:** Temporary restrictions for repeated offenses
• **Bans:** Permanent removal for severe violations
• **Appeals:** Contact staff if you believe you were treated unfairly

footer.text: Rules are subject to change. Check back regularly!

pin.title: 📢 Important Announcements

fields.name: 🔄 Game Updates

channels.name: 🎯┃role-selection
channels.topic: Get your roles and customize your experience

pin.title: 🎯 Role Selection
pin.description: Choose your roles to customize your server experience and get access to relevant channels!

fields.name: 🎮 Gaming Roles
fields.value: React to get access to game-specific channels and LFG groups

fields.name: 🏆 Rank Roles
fields.value: Get your rank role based on your skill level in various games

fields.name: 🎨 Content Creator Roles
fields.value: Streamer, YouTuber, Artist, or Music Producer roles

fields.name: 📢 Notification Roles

fields.value: Participate in community events and special activities

footer.text: React with the emojis below to get your roles!

channels.name: 👋┃introductions
channels.topic: Introduce yourself to the community

pin.title: 👋 Introduce Yourself!
pin.description: Welcome to our community! Tell us about yourself and your gaming interests.

fields.name: 📝 Introduction Format
fields.value:
• **Name/Alias:** What should we call you?
• **Favorite Games:** What games do you play?
• **Platform:** PC, Console, Mobile?
• **Interests:** What brings you here?
• **Fun Fact:** Something interesting about you!

fields.name: 🎮 Gaming Interests
fields.value: Share your favorite genres, games, and what you're looking forward to playing

fields.name: 🤝 Community
fields.value: Let us know how we can help you get involved in our community

channels.name: 🔍┃lfg-text
channels.topic: Looking for group - find teammates and gaming partners

pin.title: 🔍 Looking for Group (LFG)
pin.description: Find teammates, gaming partners, and groups for various games. Use the format below for better visibility.

fields.name: 📝 LFG Format
fields.value:
**Game:** [Game Name]
**Platform:** [PC/Console/Mobile]
**Mode:** [Ranked/Casual/Custom]
**Players Needed:** [Number]
**Skill Level:** [Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced]
**Time:** [When you want to play]
**Region:** [Your region/timezone]

fields.name: 🎯 Tips
fields.value:
• Be specific about what you're looking for
• Include your timezone and availability
• Mention your skill level honestly
• Be patient - good teammates are worth waiting for!

channels.name: 🎮┃lfg-voice-1
channels.topic: General LFG voice channel for team coordination

channels.name: 🎮┃lfg-voice-2
channels.topic: Secondary LFG voice channel for larger groups

channels.name: ⚔️┃scrims
channels.topic: Find scrims, practice matches, and competitive games

pin.title: ⚔️ Scrims & Practice Matches
pin.description: Organize scrims, practice matches, and competitive games with other teams.

fields.name: 🏷️ Post Tags
fields.value: Use appropriate tags to categorize your scrim request

fields.name: 📋 Scrim Format
fields.value:
**Team Name:** [Your team name]
**Game:** [Game name]
**Format:** [5v5, 10-man, etc.]
**Skill Level:** [Your team's level]
**Time:** [When you want to play]
**Map Pool:** [Preferred maps]
**Rules:** [Any special rules]

fields.name: 🤝 Etiquette
fields.value:
• Be respectful to opposing teams
• Show up on time for scheduled matches
• Communicate clearly about any changes
• Have fun and learn from each match!

channels.name: 🏆┃ranked-lfg
channels.topic: Find teammates for ranked/competitive matches

pin.title: 🏆 Ranked LFG
pin.description: Find teammates for ranked and competitive matches. Make sure to include your current rank!

fields.name: 📊 Rank Information
fields.value: Include your current rank, peak rank, and preferred roles

fields.name: 🎯 Goals
fields.value: Are you looking to climb, maintain, or just have fun in ranked?

fields.name: ⏰ Availability
fields.value: When are you typically available for ranked games?

channels.name: 💬┃general-chat
channels.topic: Main community chat for general discussions

channels.name: 🎮┃game-discussion
channels.topic: Discuss games, strategies, tips, and tricks

pin.title: 🎮 Game Discussion
pin.description: Share strategies, tips, tricks, and discuss your favorite games with the community.

fields.name: 💡 What to Share
fields.value:
• Game strategies and tips
• New discoveries and techniques
• Patch analysis and meta discussions
• Questions about gameplay

fields.name: 🎯 Guidelines
fields.value:
• Keep discussions constructive
• Be open to different playstyles
• Help newer players learn
• Respect different skill levels

channels.name: 📸┃clips-highlights
channels.topic: Share your best clips, highlights, and epic moments

pin.title: 📸 Clips & Highlights
pin.description: Share your best gaming moments, epic plays, and funny clips with the community!

fields.name: 📹 What to Share
fields.value:
• Epic plays and clutches
• Funny moments and fails
• Tournament highlights
• Creative content

fields.name: 📝 Guidelines
fields.value:
• Keep clips appropriate for all ages
• Add context to your clips
• Credit others if featuring their content
• Use spoiler tags for recent game content

channels.name: 🎨┃artwork
channels.topic: Share gaming artwork, fan art, and creative content

pin.title: 🎨 Gaming Artwork
pin.description: Showcase your gaming-related artwork, fan art, and creative projects!

fields.name: 🎨 What to Share
fields.value:
• Fan art of your favorite games
• Original gaming artwork
• Digital art and illustrations
• Creative gaming content

fields.name: 📝 Guidelines
fields.value:
• Credit the original game/character
• Keep content appropriate
• Be respectful of others' work
• Encourage and support fellow artists

channels.name: 💰┃trading
channels.topic: Trade in-game items, accounts, and gaming merchandise

pin.title: 💰 Trading & Marketplace
pin.description: Trade in-game items, accounts, and gaming merchandise safely within our community.

fields.name: ⚠️ Safety First
fields.value:
• Use trusted middlemen for high-value trades
• Never share personal information
• Screenshot all trade agreements
• Report suspicious activity to staff

fields.name: 📝 Trade Format
fields.value:
**Trading:** [What you have]
**Want:** [What you want]
**Platform:** [PC/Console/Mobile]
**Contact:** [How to reach you]

fields.name: 🚫 Prohibited
fields.value:
• Real money transactions (use official platforms)
• Account sharing or selling
• Scamming or fraudulent trades
• Trading outside of Discord

channels.name: 🎵┃music
channels.topic: Share gaming music, soundtracks, and music discussions

pin.title: 🎵 Gaming Music
pin.description: Share your favorite gaming soundtracks, music, and discuss gaming audio!

fields.name: 🎶 What to Share
fields.value:
• Game soundtracks and OSTs
• Gaming music covers
• Original gaming music
• Music discussion and recommendations

fields.name: 📝 Guidelines
fields.value:
• Respect copyright and fair use
• Credit original composers when possible
• Keep music appropriate for all ages
• Support independent gaming musicians

fields.value:

channels.name: 📋┃reports
channels.topic: Report rule violations, harassment, and other issues

pin.title: 📋 How to Report
pin.description: Report rule violations, harassment, or other issues to our moderation team.

fields.name: 📝 Report Format
fields.value:
**User:** @username or User ID
**Rule Violation:** Which rule was broken
**Evidence:** Screenshots or message links
**Description:** What happened
**Additional Info:** Any other relevant details

fields.name: ⚠️ What to Report
fields.value:
• Harassment or bullying
• Spam or excessive messages
• NSFW content
• Scamming or fraudulent activity
• Other rule violations

fields.name: 🚫 False Reports
fields.value: False or malicious reports may result in warnings or restrictions.
